name: Arcanine
description: The Legendary Pokémon. A legendary Pokémon in the East. Many people are charmed by the grace and beauty of its running.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you can impose disadvantage on an enemy attack roll of your choice.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from fire or fire-type attacks. Instead, immediately after taking a hit from a fire-type move, or in open flames, double the STAB bonus on the next fire-type move.

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a dark-type move, it gets advantage on its next attack.
